comments.comment:
Incorrect: This is a myth perpetuated by ignorant people. MSG is a naturally occurring amino acid and can be found in all meats/fishes, mushrooms, tomato etc. The very reason you use Maldive fish (Umbalakada) flakes or dry fish in your dishes is to add MSG.
MSG has been tested for several decades and proven to be a safe agent for human consumption at the current level of usage.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monosodium_glutamate#Safety
comments.author: Saasi Sinhale Osu
